skill.name: typescript-review
skill.description: Review TypeScript and JavaScript code changes for compliance with Metabase coding standards, style violations, and code quality issues. Use when reviewing pull requests or diffs containing TypeScript/JavaScript code.
skill.summary: Review TypeScript and JavaScript code changes for compliance with Metabase coding standards, style v...

security_audit.summary: The skill only contains review guidance and references shared commands. No file access, network activity, or execution logic is present. No malicious patterns were detected.

content.user_title: Review TypeScript changes with Metabase standards
content.value_statement: Code reviews can miss style and quality issues in TypeScript and JavaScript. This skill guides consistent reviews aligned with Metabase standards.
actual_capabilities: Focuses reviews on Metabase coding standards
Checks for code quality and best practices
Includes React best practice focus when applicable
limitations: Does not run linters or tests directly
No automated code changes or fixes
Limited to guidance based on provided diffs
No enforcement of repository specific rules beyond guidance

use_cases.title: Standardize PR feedback
use_cases.description: Apply consistent TypeScript and JavaScript review criteria across pull requests.

use_cases.title: Enforce style consistency
use_cases.description: Ensure team reviews align with Metabase coding standards and conventions.

use_cases.title: Self review before PR
use_cases.description: Precheck code for quality, types, and documentation expectations.

prompt_templates.title: Basic PR review
prompt_templates.prompt: Review this TypeScript diff for Metabase standards, code quality, and type safety. List any issues and suggestions.

prompt_templates.title: React focused review
prompt_templates.prompt: Review this React and TypeScript change for best practices, type safety, and JSDoc clarity. Note risks.

prompt_templates.title: JSDoc check
prompt_templates.prompt: Check this JavaScript diff for correct and clear JSDoc comments and any style violations.

prompt_templates.title: Deep quality audit
prompt_templates.prompt: Perform a detailed review of this TypeScript refactor for standards compliance, type safety, and maintainability.

output_examples.input: Review this TypeScript diff for standards and type safety.
output: Missing return type on exported function
Unsafe any usage in reducer state
JSDoc comment does not match parameter name

best_practices: Provide the diff context and file purpose
Call out type safety issues with concrete examples
Separate style violations from functional risks
anti_patterns: Requesting fixes without providing code context
Ignoring JSDoc changes in public APIs

faq.question: Is this compatible with JavaScript and TypeScript?
faq.answer: Yes, it targets both TypeScript and JavaScript review guidance.

faq.question: What are the main limits of this skill?
faq.answer: It provides guidance only and does not run tools or modify code.

faq.question: Can it integrate with CI or linting tools?
faq.answer: No, it only recommends checks and does not execute commands.

faq.question: Does it access or transmit my data?
faq.answer: No, it contains no data access or network behavior.

faq.question: What if the review misses a project specific rule?
faq.answer: Provide the rule in the prompt so the guidance can include it.

faq.question: How does it compare to automated linters?
faq.answer: It complements linters with human style and design feedback.
